import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {db} from '../firebase' const CreateOperation = () =>{ const [concept, setConcept] = useState('') const [amount, setAmount] = useState('') const [date, setDate] = useState('') const [type, setType] = useState('') const [category, setCategory] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() // procedimiento para guardar const store = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(e) await db.collection('operations').doc().set( ); console.log('firebase!') } return (

setConcept(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" required />
setAmount(e.target.value)} type="number" placeholder="Amount in $" className="form-control" min={1} required />
setDate(e.target.value)} type="date" className="form-control" required />
) } export default CreateOperation
